docs.title: Classes
docs.text: Class Description Any This is a placeholder for the experimental linkml:any behavior for unions Institution Institution related to study or research personnel Record One row / entity within the database AssociatedParty Sponsors, collaborators, and other parties affiliated with a research study Practitioner For our purposes, this will be an investigator

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Slot Description classifier Research Study Party Organization Type (what type of institution is party) description Note relating to who this person is in relation to the study email An email address to reach the entity external_id Other identifiers for this entity, eg, from the submitting study or in system... id Global ID for this record institution_id The institution this record is associated with name Name of the entity party Individual or organization associated with study period_end End attribute for a FHIR period data type period_start Start attribute for a FHIR period data type practitioner_role_id The Global ID for the PractitionerRole that links a Practitioner to their Ins... role Research Study Party Role title The title of the Investigator, eg, "Assistant Professor"

docs.title: Enumerations
docs.text: Enumeration Description EnumResearchStudyPartyOrganizationType Research Study Party Organization Type EnumResearchStudyPartyRole This is a ResearchStudy's party role

docs.title: Types
docs.text: Type Description Boolean A binary (true or false) value Curie a compact URI Date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime Datetime The combination of a date and time Decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... Double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification Float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification Integer An integer Jsonpath A string encoding a JSON Path Jsonpointer A string encoding a JSON Pointer Ncname Prefix part of CURIE Nodeidentifier A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model Objectidentifier A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model Sparqlpath A string encoding a SPARQL Property Path String A character string Time A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... Uri a complete URI Uriorcurie a URI or a CURIE

docs.title: Class: Associated Party (AssociatedParty)
docs.text:
Sponsors, collaborators, and other parties affiliated with a research study.

URI: kfi_fhir_sparks:AssociatedParty

 classDiagram
    class AssociatedParty
    click AssociatedParty href "../AssociatedParty/"
      Record <|-- AssociatedParty
        click Record href "../Record/"

      AssociatedParty : classifier





        AssociatedParty --> "*" EnumResearchStudyPartyOrganizationType : classifier
        click EnumResearchStudyPartyOrganizationType href "../EnumResearchStudyPartyOrganizationType/"



      AssociatedParty : external_id

      AssociatedParty : id

      AssociatedParty : name

      AssociatedParty : party





        AssociatedParty --> "0..1" Any : party
        click Any href "../Any/"



      AssociatedParty : period_end

      AssociatedParty : period_start

      AssociatedParty : role





        AssociatedParty --> "0..1" EnumResearchStudyPartyRole : role
        click EnumResearchStudyPartyRole href "../EnumResearchStudyPartyRole/"

name: AssociatedParty
annotations:

    tag: fhir_resource

is_a: Record
attributes:
  name:
    name: name
    description: Name of the entity.
    title: Name
    from_schema: https://carrollaboratory.github.io/kif-fhir-input
    rank: 1000
    alias: name
    owner: AssociatedParty
    domain_of:
    - Practitioner
    - Institution
    - AssociatedParty
    range: string
    required: false
  role:
    name: role
    description: Research Study Party Role
    title: Role
    from_schema: https://carrollaboratory.github.io/kif-fhir-input
    rank: 1000
    alias: role
    owner: AssociatedParty
    domain_of:
    - AssociatedParty
    range: EnumResearchStudyPartyRole
    required: false
  period_start:
    name: period_start
    description: Start attribute for a FHIR period data type.
    title: Period Start
    from_schema: https://carrollaboratory.github.io/kif-fhir-input
    rank: 1000
    alias: period_start
    owner: AssociatedParty
    domain_of:
    - AssociatedParty
    range: datetime
    required: false
    multivalued: true
  period_end:
    name: period_end
    description: End attribute for a FHIR period data type.
    title: Period End
    from_schema: https://carrollaboratory.github.io/kif-fhir-input
    rank: 1000
    alias: period_end
    owner: AssociatedParty
    domain_of:
    - AssociatedParty
    range: datetime
    required: false
    multivalued: true
  classifier:
    name: classifier
    description: Research Study Party Organization Type (what type of institution
      is party)
    title: Classifier
    from_schema: https://carrollaboratory.github.io/kif-fhir-input
    rank: 1000
    alias: classifier
    owner: AssociatedParty
    domain_of:
    - AssociatedParty
    range: EnumResearchStudyPartyOrganizationType
    required: false
    multivalued: true
  party:
    name: party
    description: Individual or organization associated with study
    title: Associated Party
    from_schema: https://carrollaboratory.github.io/kif-fhir-input
    rank: 1000
    alias: party
    owner: AssociatedParty
    domain_of:
    - AssociatedParty
    range: Any
    any_of:
    - range: Practitioner
    - range: Institution
  id:
    name: id
    description: Global ID for this record
    title: ID
    from_schema: https://carrollaboratory.github.io/kif-fhir-input
    rank: 1000
    identifier: true
    alias: id
    owner: AssociatedParty
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    required: true
    multivalued: false
  external_id:
    name: external_id
    description: Other identifiers for this entity, eg, from the submitting study
      or in systems link dbGaP
    title: External Identifiers
    from_schema: https://carrollaboratory.github.io/kif-fhir-input
    rank: 1000
    alias: external_id
    owner: AssociatedParty
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: uriorcurie
    required: false
    multivalued: true

docs.title: ER Diagram
docs.text:
erDiagram
Any {

}
AssociatedParty {
    string name  
    EnumResearchStudyPartyRole role  
    datetimeList period_start  
    datetimeList period_end  
    EnumResearchStudyPartyOrganizationTypeList classifier  
    string id  
    uriorcurieList external_id  
}
Institution {
    string name  
    string institution_id  
}
Practitioner {
    string name  
    string email  
    string practitioner_role_id  
    string description  
    string title  
    string id  
    uriorcurieList external_id  
}
Record {
    string id  
    uriorcurieList external_id  
}

AssociatedParty ||--|o Any : "party"
Practitioner ||--|o Institution : "institution_id"
